info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Goliad and central Bee Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Berclair, or 8 miles northeast of Beeville, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Normanna, Berclair and Tuleta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 580 and 598. US Highway 59 between mile markers 680 and 700. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
